amendment.description: An amendment numbered 116 printed in Part A of House Report 119-199 to strike funds from being used for assistance to Ukraine.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 76 - 353 (Roll no. 209).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 76 - 353 (Roll no. 209).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
